reviews.review: This is a great game, a classic if u will. But fuck the ending, the last few levels in the "alien" world are just horrible. Besides this I daresay you have a great (although old) fps experience here! Highly Recommended.

Just finished the game, To be honest, i really enjoyed it, the engine can make up some funny bugs and the story is really interesting, Day be so fine then BOOM, resonance cascade.

I like the old classic look of the game and the voice acting is well-done, the fact i can also use mods on this and it's an easy thing to do makes it more playable, the difficulty is mixed and you can meet a challenge that looks extremely hard but thats what makes it a good challenge.

Overall i really enjoyed playing through the game and i would recommend it to anyone that's looking for a game that's paced on your own skill with the engine. And as stated before, you can get mods on this thing to get stories made by the community
Fazla konuşmaya gerek yok bilen bilir yılların getirdiği efsanevi bir oyun.

Игра То Хорошая, Но есть Огромный Минус
1 Очень Легко Заблудится
My first time playing the Half-Life games. Still enjoyable in 2021. I think every PC Player should play the Half-Life games once in their life.

One of the most influential games ever made. Though many of its qualities may appear standard by now, it is Half-Life that made them so. Despite it's age I'd argue the gunplay and level design still hold up and it's more then worth a try. (Besides Xen, screw Xen)
Half life is a that still holds decent even today. for the story and game-play [Bit clunky] but the game now is a little harder to. but reccomend.
Evergreen. Although there are too many bugs for my liking.
Одна из самых любимых серий игр!

Yıl olmuş 2021 oynamayan kaldıysa kesinlikle oynasın. Ben hiçbir mod vs. kurmadan oynadım ve grafikleri rahatsızlık vermiyor hala. Eğer HD takıntınız varsa da oyunun hayran yapımı olan Black Mesa'yı oynayın ama kesinlikle oynayın. Zamanına göre 10/10

A classic that never gets boring, the only time I wouldn't recommend it is to people who don't like first person shooters, but besides that it's amazing, a masterpiece that was ahead of it's time and still comes together as an enjoyable experience. Worth any money you spend on it.
Tam bir başyapıt. FPS oyunlarının atası desek yeridir.
It's Half Life. If that's not enough to recommend it to you, I honestly don't know what is.

Rise and shine, Mister Freeman. Rise and... shine. Not that I... wish to imply you have been sleeping on the job. No one is more deserving of a rest... and all the effort in the world would have gone to waste until... well, let's just say your hour has... come again.

The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world. So, wake up, Mister Freeman. Wake up and... smell the ashes...

Excelente modo historia, sigue siendo muy bueno como lo recuerdo. Quizás por la nostalgia y por su rapidez le de más elogios que al mismo remake (black mesa).
En multijugador, pues frenético, aun hay gente activa en los servers desde 1998 a la fecha. Los cabineros más acérrimos no dejan de jugar esta joya del pasado.

The singleplayer sucks
Multiplayer is good
Игра имеет хорошие стороны, такие как игра,при покупке я ощутил палитру всех  аспектов из мода Divine RPG , всем советую сделать тоже самое🎈🎈🎈
Let me put it simply, best game ever made.

"I've killed twelve dumbass scientists and not one of 'em has fought back...


...it's great!"
This game is grade A... if you are doubting about it then you are wasting your time.
Jogo muuuito a frente do seu tempo
All I need now is some mods.
we are with the science team
Twenty years and this game is still an adventure. Timeless.

It hasn't aged well in certain aspects, but it's a good game. Certainly has some spooky moments. It's just unfortunate that the spookiest ones can be platforming. At 17 hours to credits I'd say it was worth the time invested just for the chance to play hide and seek with the G man.

My first time playing Half-Life and my god was this game a masterpiece. I grew playing console games and the famous Master Chief of Halo, now into the PC world present with Gordon Freeman in Half-Life. Halo was always my favorite sci-fi shooter, but Half-Life now holds a special place in my heart alongside.
bad and boring extremely overrated and repetitive, it is an old game but DOOM is older and 100x better than this garbage
a boomer, to be sure, but a welcome one

Игра моего детства, самый лучший боевик  от первого лица в какие я только и не играл. Конечно любитель графики не захотел бы поиграть в такое, но, не смотря на такую графику, на на процесс игры, ты должен думать головой и как-то выжить, что-бы пройти всю игру до конца. В общем если говорить кратко: лучшая игра года и детства, я рекомендую.
Classic FPS, has aged really well
I cant get the voices out of my head.

as someone who loves the series, I would really like to love this game, but I cant, the movement is very good and fun, the graphics havent aged wel butl its not horrible, but the level design is just straight up bad and unintuitive for someone on their first playthrough. I often found myself not knowing what I am supposed to do and it was very frustrating. not being able to load a previous quicksave like in half life 2 also worsened the experience as I would often softlock myself into a death loop and be forced to either cheat or use an autosave.
Игра чисто на Тро3чку. Даже не знаю, что это за кампания такая "Кран"

Half Life is a work of fps genius. The gunplay is fun and satisfying, the story is great although bare bones since it was the 90's, and the artstyle and aesthetic is incredible. I love the industrial gloom of the Black Mesa lab, and the enemy design ranges from basic human guards, to crazy alien creatures. The only complaint is the final levels of the game, where there are a lot of frusturating moments to be had in. Still an incredible game. 9.7/10
Best game in this side of the galaxy. The history its amazing. 10/10 would play again and again

Good game with some fun combat and interesting levels. The game does get a bit repetitive after a few hours, although the level design does make up for that. The story premise is interesting but I don't think it's a masterpiece like most people make it out to be.

Если вкратце то Half-Life хороший одиночный шутер с бесплатным живым мультиплеером. 
О игре: хороший сюжет, разнообразие локаций, оружия и механик, которые не дадут заскучать во время прохождения. Графика 90-х годов что не мешает игре быть на высоте (мы же не графодрочеры, верно?).
О мультиплеере: чаще там либо новички которые только получили игру бесплатно от своего одноклассника и забили фигу на прохождение, либо какой-нибудь старый батя играющий с момента выхода. Но есть и плюсы вроде прохождения кампании со своим другом или веселой игры с друзьями или просто хорошими игроками коих немало.
Вывод: игра стоит своих денег, но никто не запрещает купить игру по скидке.
What can I say? It's Half Life. GET IT!
